alice_pct.long_description: Percentage of households that are Asset Limited, Income Constrained, Employed. Households Earning more than the Federal Poverty Level, but not enough to afford the basics where they live.
alice_pct.long_name: Percentage of households that are Asset Limited, Income Constrained, Employed (ALICE)
alice_pct.short_description: The percent of households that are above the Federal Poverty Level but still cannot afford the basics where they live.
alice_pct.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} are ALICE.

poverty_pct.long_description: Percentage of households that are below the Federal Poverty Level. Not being able to afford the basics where they live.
poverty_pct.long_name: Percentage of households that are below the Federal Poverty Level.
poverty_pct.short_description: The percent of households that are below the Federal Poverty Level.
poverty_pct.statement: {value} of the households in {features.name} are in poverty.
